GSD.description:
bpf: Don't redirect packets with invalid pkt_len

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.141 by commit 6204bf78b2a903b96ba43afff6abc0b04d6e0462. For more details please see the references link.
